general_advisory: Due to forecast no rainfall, harvest all matured crops & Keep provision of critical irrigation for rabi crops. Choose always medium to short duration varieties in rabi paddy. Before sowing the field bund and field should be clean.

advisory: Nursery stage - The good varieties are MTU 1156, MTU 1153. Prepare the nursery in 10 decimal for one acre.
Growth stage - 21 days after germination, apply 6-8 kg Nitrogen/acre.
Growth stage - At 3-4 week stage of groundnut, go for inter cultivation, after that do not disturb the soil specially at peg formation stage. Apply 50 kg Gypsum per acre leaving 5 cm from the row.
Growth stage - After inter cultivation apply balance half nitrogen i.e 30 kg/acre.
Growth stage - Due to weather there may be powdery mildew attack, to manage this spray sulfur powder @ 1kg in 200 liters of water.
Sowing stage - Sow the pulses to avoid effect of decreasing temperature.
The animals are to be vaccinated in consultation of line departments.
Due to weather there will be deficit in oxygen, to manage stir the water from one corner to maintain the oxygen level.
